title: ‘Reservation Dogs’ Creator Sterlin Harjo on the Season Finale, Plus ‘Andor’ Episode 4
description:
Chris and Andy talk about the universally bad reviews for ‘Blonde’ and other “car crash movies” (1:00). Then, they break down the fourth episode of ‘Andor’ (24:01) before Andy is joined by ‘Reservation Dogs’ creator Sterlin Harjo to talk about the Season 2 finale and the show as a whole (36:01).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Sterlin Harjo
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
